trigger_event: On every `git push` to a feature branch
success_criteria: Linter passes; Unit test coverage > 80% (REQ-1-101); All unit tests pass.
failure_action: Block merge to `main`; Fail the build in GitHub Actions.
escalation_procedure: Developer responsible for the commit must fix the build.
business_impact: Prevents basic errors and ensures baseline code quality before peer review.

trigger_event: After successful deployment to the Staging environment
success_criteria: 100% pass rate for the E2E smoke test suite (covering all critical user journeys).
failure_action: Automatically roll back the deployment; Create a P1 bug and alert the on-call developer.
escalation_procedure: Alert sent to team's Slack channel; Incident lead assigned.
business_impact: Prevents critical regressions from reaching the main testing environment, saving QA time.

trigger_event: Manual trigger before a planned production release
success_criteria: P95 latency of all critical APIs are within NFRs (REQ-1-093); No new critical or high vulnerabilities found by security scans (REQ-1-098); Full regression suite pass rate > 99.5%.
failure_action: Block the production release; Convene a Go/No-Go meeting.
responsible_team: QA, DevOps, Security, and Development Leads
escalation_procedure: Report sent to all stakeholders; Emergency review meeting scheduled.
business_impact: Final quality checkpoint to prevent performance issues and security vulnerabilities in production.
